title: Episode 46: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!
author: One Man, One Piece
description: A podcast review of One Piece Episode 46, featuring Buggy's adventure and his encounter with Gaimon. The hosts discuss this 'cute little filler episode with a cute little Buggy the Clown and our old boxed and sheltered friend, Gaimon.'
